claim_extraction.claim: Remote work saves companies $11,000 per employee annually in real estate costs
claim_extraction.canonicalized_claim: Remote work reduces company costs by $11,000 per employee each year through saved office space
suggested_queries: company real estate savings remote work
Global Workplace Analytics remote work costs

passages.reason: Stanford study estimates $10,000-$20,000 annual savings per remote employee
Twitter reported only $100M savings vs $500M theoretical, showing gap between estimates and reality
Global Workplace Analytics suggests 30-50% overhead reduction from eliminating offices

reasoning_bullets: Theoretical savings estimates far exceed actual company reports
Many companies still need office space for collaboration and culture
Stanford study based on pre-pandemic data, not actual implementation
